abstract: A designation from the Producers Guild of America would serve as a seal of approval of sorts, certifying that the person listed as a producer fulfilled the necessary decision-making and advisory functions.
snippet: A designation from the Producers Guild of America would serve as a seal of approval of sorts, certifying that the person listed as a producer fulfilled the necessary decision-making and advisory functions.

headline.main: Three Studios Agree to Let a Guild Certify Credits for Film Producers
headline.print_headline: 3 Studios Agree to Let a Guild Certify Credits for Film Producers
